description:
This isn't desirable, as deploy images run privileged so having them public may disclose operational config.

To reproduce just register a deploy ramdisk + kernel with is-public False.
title: deploy ramdisk and kernel must be public glance images

comments.content:

comments.content: I assume this is a baremetal bug, in which case I'm making it invalid because we just deprecated that driver
